sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import "./BecomeSeller.css"; const testimonials = [ { content: "We acquire more customers on WhatNew in a week than we do in our stores in a year.", image: "assets/Hobby.png", name: " Sammie, Sports Cards Seller", title: ".@hobbyboxny", }, { content: "The community is full of nice, supportive people... I have people who watch me stream 3x a week... I really appreciate the bond I've built with my customers.", image: "assets/Theli.png", name: "Myra, Beauty Seller", title: ".@theliplady", }, { content: "For me being able to have a real business on WhatNew that is interactive, has rapid growth and is just overall fun has been a dream.", image: "assets/Brick.png", name: "Jon,Toys Seller", title: ".@brickluv", }, { content: "Last August, prior to live selling, I made ₹600 in sales on static platforms. This August, I will hit ₹125k in sales.", image: "assets/Caitie.png", name: "Caitie,Women's Fashion Seller", title: ".@CaitieCo", }, ]; const cardsData = [ { title: "Your audience awaits", description: "Reach millions of eager buyers on WhatNew—shoppers as excited to discover your products as you are to sell them.", }, { title: "You belong here", description: "Whether you’re new or seasoned, young or old, tech-savvy or just starting out—there’s a place for you on WhatNew. Our sellers earn an average of ₹25K a year!", }, { title: "Sell your way", description: "On WhatNew, you can sell in real-time through live shows or list products in your store for buyers to shop at their own pace—or do both. The choice is yours!", }, ]; const faqs = [ { question: "How do I get paid?", answer: "You’ll get paid 48–72 hours after your package is delivered. Payments first appear as WhatNew credit in your account, which you can easily cash out to your bank.", }, { question: "How does shipping work?", answer: "We partner with services like USPS and Canada Post to ensure your order is delivered safely and securely. After you complete your sale, we’ll create a prepaid label so you can ship your item hassle-free.", }, { question: "What are the fees?", answer: "8% commission on the item’s sold price. 2.9% + ₹0.30 payment processing fee on the entire transaction. Payment processing applies to the subtotal, tax, and shipping paid by the buyer. No payment processing fee is applied to international shipping or taxes.", }, { question: "When can I schedule a show?", answer: "You can schedule your show anytime! Viewership is consistent throughout the week, and you can also list items for always-on selling in your WhatNew store to keep growing even when you’re not live.", }, { question: "What can I sell?", answer: "The true question is what can’t you sell on WhatNew! We currently have 50+ categories – electronics, fashion, collectibles, beauty, live plants, and more.", }, { question: "Is it safe?", answer: "Yes! WhatNew has best-in-class support and tools to ensure a smooth shopping experience. Our priority has always been to build a community with trust, reliability, and safety.", }, ]; const HomePage = () => { const [currentIndex, setCurrentIndex] = useState(0); // Auto-slide testimonials every 5 seconds useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { setCurrentIndex(prevIndex => prevIndex === testimonials.length - 1 ? 0 : prevIndex + 1 ); }, 5000); return () => clearInterval(interval); // cleanup on unmount }, []); return (
{/* Promo Section */}

Make more selling what you love.

Show and sell. Go live on WhatNew.

{/* WhatNew Section */}

What is WhatNew?

WhatNew is a shopping experience like no other, where anyone can sell what they love.

{/* Cards Section */}
{cardsData.map((card, index) => (

{card.title}

{card.description}

))}
{/* Sellers Section */}

Discover why sellers are choosing WhatNew

Make more selling your way

Selling live on WhatNew is exciting—and customers make 10x more transactions here than on other peer-to-peer marketplaces. And when you’re not live, your WhatNew store keeps the sales rolling.

Reach a huge audience of enthusiasts

Connect with millions of buyers on WhatNew—the largest live shopping app in North America and Europe. Our buyers aren’t just browsing; they’re passionate about discovering unique finds from sellers like you.

We make it easy

Our integrated tools and support handle payments, shipping, and everything else, so you can focus on selling what you love.

Sell with joy

Live selling on WhatNew isn’t just exciting—it’s pure fun. Share your passion with like-minded shoppers and turn them into loyal fans.

* Source: Bloomberg Second Measure; March 31, 2023 — March 31, 2024*

{/* Testimonial Carousel Section */}

Hear from real sellers

"{testimonials[currentIndex].content}"

{testimonials[currentIndex].name}

{testimonials[currentIndex].title}

How It Works

Sign up

Whether you’re a seasoned pro or just starting out, you’re welcome to join as a seller. Sign up today to become part of our amazing community and start building your business! .

Powerful Features

When it comes to selling on WhatNew, you’ve got options .

Sell in a live show

  • Host a show and chat with your audience in real-time.
  • Auction off items, sell items at fixed prices with our Buy-It-Now feature, or run giveaways
  • Camera-shy? No problem – many of our sellers feature their products front-and-center rather than showing their faces
  • Show off your products and geek out with buyers who are excited to hear from you

    • Sell from your WhatNew store 24/7

  • List products in your WhatNew store and let buyers shop your products at their own pace on both auction and Buy-It-Now items
  • Keep making sales even when you’re not hosting a show

    • Ship and get paid

    Grab your pre-paid WhatNew shipping labels from the Seller Hub, stick them on your package, and ship! Just 48–72 hours after delivery, you can cash out via direct deposit .

    Frequently Asked Questions

    {/* FAQ Section */}

    Frequently Asked Questions

    {faqs.map((faq, index) => (
    toggleFAQ(index)} >

    {faq.question}

    {activeFAQ === index ? "−" : "+"}
    {activeFAQ === index && (

    {faq.answer}

    )}
    ))}
    ); }; export default HomePage;
